statements: SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_status, response_time FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE support_agent = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, support_agent, response_time FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY response_time ASC;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_status IN ('Open', 'Closed');
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE support_agent = 'John Smith';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, support_agent, ticket_status FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, count(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_tickets > 1;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, response_time FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE response_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_subject, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE resolved = false;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_subject FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM email_follow_up ORDER BY follow_up_date DESC;
SELECT follow_up_message FROM email_follow_up WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_subject FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_subject, resolved FROM support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT t1.*, e.follow_up_date, e.follow_up_message FROM support_tickets AS t1 JOIN email_follow_up AS e ON t1.ticket_id = e.ticket_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_status FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, response_date FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM customer_emails WHERE is_primary_email = true;
SELECT email_id, email_address FROM customer_emails ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Closed';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_emails WHERE is_primary_email = TRUE;
SELECT email_id, email_address FROM customer_emails ORDER BY email_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, created_at, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT response_id, ticket_id, response_text, response_by, response_timestamp FROM CustomerSupportResponses WHERE response_by = 'Support Agent';
SELECT followup_id, email_address, followup_status FROM EmailFollowUp WHERE followup_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT response_id, response_text, response_timestamp FROM CustomerSupportResponses WHERE response_by = 'Support Team';
SELECT c.contact_id, c.customer_name, c.email_address, t.ticket_description FROM CustomerContacts c JOIN CustomerSupportTickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_details FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, template_subject FROM customers JOIN email_logs ON customers.customer_id = email_logs.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT template_subject, template_body FROM email_templates WHERE template_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_tickets > 2;
